title: 06/09/21 DPS Hour 1
itunes:title: 06/09/21 DPS Hour 1
description:
Dan talks about pitchers using foreign substances in Major League Baseball. Dan says baseball is on a slippery slope with pitchers and what they are allowed to get away with.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
